newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Motorola strong buy repeated.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Motorola strong buy repeated.

text.p: Gruntal & Co said Thursday it repeated a strong buy rating on Motorola Inc after the technology company reported second quarter earnings exceeding Wall Street estimates.

Gruntal also said it trimmed its 1997 earnings estimate to $3.00 a share from $3.20 to reflect reported results for the first half and their variance frm from Gruntal estimates. Gruntal maintained its 1998 earnings estimate at $4.00.
Motorola reported second quarter earnings $0.62 before a charge of $0.18, which was above Wall Street estimates of $0.56 but below Gruntal's estimate of $0.67.
Shares of Motorola were trading off 1-1/8 to 84-7/8.
